mapper.select: select t.*, (case when t.currcode='001' then t.homecurbal else round(t.homecurbal / 100 * t.roe, 2) end) as rmbbal from (select a.txndate, a.actno, a.actname, a.acttype, (select enuitemlabel from ptenudetail where enutype='ACCTTYPE' and enuitemvalue = a.acttype) as acttypename, (select actattr from rms_sbsactattr where actname = a.actname) as actattr, a.balamt as homecurbal, substr(a.actno, 16, 3) as currcode, (select trim(curnmc) from sbs_actccy where curcde = substr(a.actno, 16, 3)) as currname, (select ratval from sbs_actcxr where curcde = substr(a.actno, 16, 3) and txndate = #{txndate} and xrtcde = '8' and secccy = '001') as roe from (select * from sbs_actbal where txndate between #{startdate} and #{enddate} and actname like '%${corpname}%' ) a) t

select round(sum(rmbbal)/10000,0) as totalamt from (select t.*, t.homecurbal as rmbbal from (select a.txndate, a.actno, a.actname, a.acttype, a.balamt as homecurbal, substr(a.actno, 16, 3) as currcode, (select ratval from sbs_actcxr where curcde = substr(a.actno, 16, 3) and txndate = #{txndate} and xrtcde = '8' and secccy = '001') as roe from (select * from sbs_actbal where txndate = #{txndate} and actno in (select actno from mt_acttype where category = #{acttype})) a) t) r where r.currcode ='001'

select round(sum(rmbbal)/10000,0) as totalamt from (select t.*, round(t.homecurbal / 100 * t.roe, 2) as rmbbal from (select a.txndate, a.actno, a.actname, a.acttype, a.balamt as homecurbal, substr(a.actno, 16, 3) as currcode, (select ratval from sbs_actcxr where curcde = substr(a.actno, 16, 3) and txndate = #{txndate} and xrtcde = '8' and secccy = '001') as roe from (select * from sbs_actbal where txndate = #{txndate} and actno in (select actno from mt_acttype where category = #{acttype})) a) t) r where r.currcode != '001'

select rownum as seqno,r.* from (select * from (select a.actno, a.actname, round((a.balamt - nvl(b.balamt, 0)) / 10000, 0) as balamt, round(a.balamt/10000, 0) as lastdayamt, round(b.balamt/10000, 0) as firstdayamt from (select * from SBS_ACTBAL where txndate = #{lastdate}) a, (select * from SBS_ACTBAL where txndate = #{firstdate}) b where a.actno = b.actno(+) order by a.actno) t order by t.balamt desc) r where rownum <= 10
